content:
China's new RMB loans in July were 345.9 billion yuan, estimated at 780 billion yuan, and the previous value was 304.95 billion yuan

China's social financing scale in July was 528.2 billion yuan, expected to be 110 billion yuan, and the previous value was 422.41 billion yuan

China's money supply M2 in July increased by 10.7% year-on-year, estimated to be 11.0%, and the previous value was 11.3%

RMB deposits decreased by 1.12 trillion yuan in July, a year-on-year decrease of 1.17 trillion yuan

Recently, a merchant on Douyin promoted a "mobile phone compliance detection system" specifically for the military
claiming that by simply scanning the code and connecting the device, you can check the deleted and withdrawn chat records in WeChat, illegal pornographic, confidential, and military content, Alipay bills, etc., and can detect up to 200 mobile phones at the same time, both Android and Apple can be used.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: A Chinese man was arrested for posting a "murder notice" on a Korean website. It is reported that he deleted it eight seconds after posting it, and then took a screenshot and posted it on Xiaohongshu.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: In recent days, topics such as "poisonous packages" and "murder notices" in South Korea have become increasingly popular on the Chinese social media Xiaohongshu. However, the South Korean Ministry of Foreign Affairs previously announced that the "poisonous packages" were sent to South Korea from Taiwan via the mainland, and now it has been revealed that the "murder notice" was directed and performed by a Chinese blogger.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Netizen contribution
Chengdu's current situation of returning forests to farmland: There were originally many undeveloped forests near the ring road, and after returning forests to farmland, a large number of sunflowers and corn were planted.
Because they were only responsible for planting performance, without any management and maintenance, large areas of flooding, insect pests, and weeds occurred, resulting in no harvest, no economic benefits, and now it has become a weed field.
Previously, a "returning forests to farmland" campaign was launched across the country, and then at the end of June, Xinhua News Agency issued an article saying that the central government had never said that it would "return forests to farmland" and it was a false concept.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
I have received a lot of this kind of comments in the past two days, which only shows one thing.
That is, more and more people are beginning to realize that they cannot receive real information in China, so they go to Twitter over the firewall.
Itâ€™s just that the information on Twitter is too intense to swallow for a while, so they are in the stage of rejection reaction, always thinking "you are all too extreme"
My suggestion is to just keep browsing for a few more days
